Metadata: Ocean Law Memo (Volume 3, No. 1 and No. 2, February 17 and May 20, 1976)
Oregon State University Sea Grant; Ocean Resources Law Program
Two newsletter issues in one entry for 1976.

The Ocean Law Memo is an advisory service of the Ocean Resources Law Program (ORLP) at the University of Oregon Law School in Eugene, Oregon. The ORLP is a part of the Department of Commerce, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration'â€‹s (NOAA) Sea Grant Program, which provides the funding for this service. The following topics are in these issues: Damages in Maritime Collisions and Groundings / The United States v. Reliable Transfer Co. Inc.; The Fishery Management and Conservation Act of 1976 (H.R. 200).
